definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Silk twill blends sturdy construction with supple softness.
sentences.chinese: 斜紋真絲混紡水嫩柔軟堅固的結構。

sentences.english: B：l‘d like to buy a pure silk dress.
The reaction mechanism of rare earth in real silk dyeing is preliminarily discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文並對真絲綢染色中稀土的作用機理作了初步探討。

sentences.english: At the end, he bought a large-sized purple coloured silk shirt.
sentences.chinese: 最後，他買了一件大號的紫色真絲新襯衫。

sentences.english: High - grade real silk fabrics is best dry-clean .
sentences.chinese: 高檔的真絲面料最好乾洗。

sentences.english: Silk tapestry, top grade gift, rare collection.
sentences.chinese: 真絲掛毯，高檔禮品，稀世藏品。

sentences.english: What they are promoting is the Blanket Cover plus the Blanket, both are 100% silk as claimed.
sentences.chinese: 此秦錦堂所推廣的是真絲被套和被褥。

sentences.english: Silk is not only has good heat dissipation performance and good warmth retention property.
sentences.chinese: 真絲不僅具有較好的散熱性能，還有很好的保暖性。

sentences.english: I'd rather have my silk dress dabbed out than put it in the laundry.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願用手洗這件真絲衣服而不送到洗衣店裏。

sentences.english: The results show that silk fabric has a good wearing comfort.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，真絲面料具有良好的穿着舒適性。

sentences.english: Silk yarn twisting is a direct way to bring forth crepe effect on the surface of heavy-weight crepes.
sentences.chinese: 絲線加捻是使真絲重縐織物起縐效應的直接手段。

sentences.english: Practice has proved the dyeing on the real silk of natural plant dyestuffs has bright prospects.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明天然植物染料在真絲綢上的染色大有可爲。

sentences.english: Silk herringbone woolen with various thickness, and also can have it made to order.
sentences.chinese: 可供多種厚度的真絲人字呢，也可來樣定做。

sentences.english: Silk is distinct from rayon in every respect.
sentences.chinese: 在各個方面真絲跟人造絲截然不同。

sentences.english: It's $ 120 per yard, including a 5% discount.
sentences.chinese: 真絲每碼120美元，其中包括5%的折扣。

sentences.english: In this paper, is discussed the finishing effect of real silk fabric with citric acid and chitin.
sentences.chinese: 文章討論了檸檬酸和殼聚糖對真絲綢防皺整理的效果。

definition: to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
